name: My story writer: Write your story ✒
name_original: My story writer: Write your story ✒
description: My story writer is a  story game where you choose and write your story! First you choose a what choice you want to make which will effect the story! You get to choose what friends you want! You also get to choose your gender and choose what life you want to live!  You can be rich or poor or be famous! Have fun and write and choose in your interactive story!
